Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Between 2pm and 5pm Nov.2nd I saw many silver sphere's flying and hovering
divs: sighting detailsa close friend (*name removed--cms\sg) called me and asked me too look up in the sky around 1:30pm on nov.2nd. he said it looked like a flame in the sky!i looked up and couldnt see what he was seeing so i called him back and he told me to look towards the sun so i did and couldnt believe what i saw.there was 7 silver spheres flying and hovering so i ran to get my camera and to my suprise there was alot of them way more than 7 flying and hovering. i was able to view them for a couple of hours i even had my neighbors whole family come to yard and let them look through my camera and they were shocked too.i was able to capture this event on film but it really shocked me when i saw the pics because there must be hundreds of them and there is a huge cluster of them also that must be in the hundreds it self.these spheres were moving in every direction they would go fast than stop and move again and some would hover and then move towards the direction of the sun.i have never seen anything like this in all of my life this was mindblowing and unexplainable.these things were very high up in the sky but you could see them with the naked eye and they seemed to go with the direction of the sun.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Litchfield
This sighting has never been favorited.
